kong-ee.message:
Added batch queues for the Datadog and StatsD plugins to reduce timer usage, fixing a `lua_max_running_timers are not enough` timer error.

Whenever a request was processed, a new running timer was instantly created during the log phase. This was causing a shortage of timers under heavy traffic and led to unpredictable consequences, where internal timers were killed randomly and couldnâ€™t recover automatically. This would then trigger a `lua_max_running_timers are not enough` timer error and cause data planes to crash.

[#9521](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/9521)
Fixed a timer leak that occurred whenever the generic messaging protocol connection would break in hybrid mode.
